title: Unitarity Problem in Gribov-Zwanziger Theory. (arXiv:2211.01099v2 [hep-th] UPDATED)
description: We show that the unitarity problem in the Gribov-Zwanziger theory can be solved by the famous quartet mechanism. The construction of the new quartet in such a theory suggests the introduction of a new form of ghost charge and projection operator
dc:creator: Thitipat Sainapha, Kei-Ichi Kondo
